text:
cl_autowepswitch 0
unbindall
cl_autowepswitch 0 
//windows 6/11; sensivity 1.45
//-console -novid -threads 8 -tickrate 128 -refresh 144 -high -nod3d9ex1 -exec autoexec
//STEAM_0:0:17543698

con_enable 1
//bind "\" "toggleconsole"
//bind "~" "toggleconsole"
bind "`" "toggleconsole"
bind "HOME" "toggleconsole"

//jthrow
alias "+jthrow" "+jump;-attack"
alias "-jthrow" "-jump"

//Keyboard
bind "0" "slot10"
bind "1" "slot1"
bind "2" "slot2"
bind "3" "slot3"
bind "4" "slot4"
bind "5" "slot5"
bind "6" "use weapon_smokegrenade"
bind "7" "use weapon_flashbang"
bind "8" "use weapon_molotov;use weapon_incgrenade"
bind "a" "+moveleft"
bind "b" "buymenu"
bind "c" "use weapon_molotov;use weapon_incgrenade"
bind "d" "+moveright"
bind "e" "+use"
bind "f" "+lookatweapon"
bind "g" "drop"
bind "h" "+spray_menu"
bind "m" "teammenu"
bind "n" "+jthrow"
bind "p" "devshots_screenshot"
bind "q" "lastinv"
bind "r" "+reload"
bind "s" "+back"
bind "w" "+forward"

bind "SPACE" "+jump"
bind "MWHEELDOWN" "+jump"
bind "TAB" "+showscores;+cl_show_team_equipment 1"
bind "ESCAPE" "cancelselect"
bind "PAUSE" "pause"
bind "SHIFT" "+speed"
bind "CTRL" "+duck"
bind "MOUSE1" "+attack;-attack"
bind "MOUSE2" "+attack2"

//coms
bind "t" "messagemode2"
bind "x" "radio1"
bind "z" "radio2"
bind "v" "radio3"
bind "y" "messagemode"
bind "u" "say \_()_/"

//F Keys
//bind "F1" "cl_crosshairthickness 1"
//bind "F2" "cl_crosshairthickness 1.15"

bind "F5" "noclip;give weapon_smokegrenade;give weapon_flashbang;give weapon_decoy;give weapon_molotov;give weapon_incgrenade"
bind "F7" "use weapon_flashbang"
//bind "F8" "exec controller.2016.cfg; joystick 1"
bind "F10" "disconnect"
bind "F11" "+voicerecord"

//BuyScript
bind "KP_INS" "buy m4a1; buy m4a1_silencer; buy ak47; drop"
bind "KP_END" "buy vest"
bind "KP_DOWNARROW" "buy smokegrenade;buy hegrenade;buy molotov;buy incgrenade;buy flashbang"
bind "KP_LEFTARROW" "buy vest;buy vesthelm"
bind "KP_5" "buy defuser"
bind "KP_RIGHTARROW" "buy smokegrenade;buy flashbang;buy molotov;buy incgrenade;buy flashbang"
bind "KP_HOME" "buy hegrenade"
bind "KP_UPARROW" "buy flashbang"
bind "KP_PGUP" "buy smokegrenade"
bind "KP_PLUS" "buy molotov;buy incgrenade"

//crosshair settings
cl_crosshair_drawoutline "0"
cl_crosshair_dynamic_maxdist_splitratio "0.35"
cl_crosshair_dynamic_splitalpha_innermod "1"
cl_crosshair_dynamic_splitalpha_outermod "0.5"
cl_crosshair_dynamic_splitdist "7"
cl_crosshair_outlinethickness "1"
cl_crosshair_sniper_width "2"
cl_crosshairalpha "255"
cl_crosshaircolor "5"
cl_crosshaircolor_b "255"
cl_crosshaircolor_g "0"
cl_crosshaircolor_r "255"
cl_crosshairdot "0"
cl_crosshairgap "-1"
cl_crosshairgap_useweaponvalue "0"
cl_crosshairscale "0"
cl_crosshairsize "4"
cl_crosshairstyle "4"
cl_crosshairthickness "1"
cl_crosshairusealpha "1"
cl_fixedcrosshairgap "3"

//GTR crosshair
cl_crosshair_drawoutline "0"
cl_crosshair_outlinethickness "1"
cl_crosshaircolor "1"
cl_crosshairdot "0"
cl_crosshairgap "-1"
cl_crosshairgap_useweaponvalue "0"
cl_crosshairscale "0"
cl_crosshairsize "5"
cl_crosshairstyle "4"
cl_crosshairthickness "1.15"
cl_crosshairusealpha "1"
cl_fixedcrosshairgap "4"

//Gameplaystuff
cl_disablehtmlmotd "1"
cl_forcepreload "1"
cl_autowepswitch "0"
cl_disablefreezecam "1"
cl_timeout "1337"
closeonbuy "1"
crosshair "1"
joystick "0"
fps_max "999"
fps_max_menu "300"
mat_queue_mode "2"
r_dynamic "1"
snd_headphone_pan_exponent "2"
zoom_sensitivity_ratio_mouse "1.0"
option_duck_method "0"
option_speed_method "0"
m_rawinput "1"

//Hud and Radar
cl_hud_background_alpha "0.5"
cl_hud_bomb_under_radar "1"
cl_hud_color "8"
cl_hud_healthammo_style "0"
cl_hud_playercount_pos "0"
cl_hud_playercount_showcount "0"
cl_righthand "1"

cl_hud_radar_scale "1.15"
cl_radar_always_centered "0"
cl_radar_icon_scale_min "0.8"
cl_radar_rotate "1"
cl_radar_scale "0.3"
cl_radar_square_with_scoreboard "1"

//Network stuff
rate "128000"
cl_cmdrate "128"
cl_updaterate "128"
cl_interp_ratio "1"
cl_interp "0"

net_graph "3"
mm_dedicated_search_maxping "70"

cl_allowdownload "1"
cl_allowupload "1"

host_writeconfig
